content: Report from ZFS health check script on **'fire-nation'** server. The script checked **'2'** pools.,

embeds.title: **Health Summary**
embeds.description: No issues found for this pool.

fields.name: Condition
fields.value: No unhealthy states found from pool status. Overall state is reporting as **ONLINE** for this pool.

fields.name: Capacity
fields.value: The pool spare capacity is within limits. The used capacity at current is **14%** for this pool.

fields.name: Errors
fields.value: No errors found in read, write or checksum fields. The pool status reports **No known data errors**.

fields.name: Scrub
fields.value: The pool scrub date has not yet been exeeded. Last scrub was performed on **Sun Jul 14 08:16:26 2024** for this pool.
